TopicTitle: The Classic Brasturn-VI Model [0.13 Stock Rocket]

Articles.Content:
Here to announce the first ever public release of an older rocket I used back in 0.13 several months ago, The Brasturn-VI!

It is indeed a very large rocket that was built over the six iterations that allowed it to be a Mun capable rocket with plenty of fuel. This was the first rocket that allowed to me to make proper Mun landings before stock landing parts were ever provided. One thing to note is that it is a very old rocket (built around March 15th, 2012) and it might not even be as efficient as the later rockets I built (considering I put a whole bunch of fuel tanks compared to future models I later built). Y'all could say I also possess smaller rockets that are just as Mun-capable as this one, but this one would be suitable for interplanetary travel (if it weren't for being rather difficult to control at the first stage ).

Be aware this rocket will only function at 0.13 (though a similar rocket can be built in 0.14 or later) in terms of the craft files being provided.

Here are some screenshots of this rocket:

Enjoy for those who enjoy a bit of nostalgia. And by the way, this rocket did have a bit of inspiration from trydyingtolive's rocket (with four winglets and entirely liquid engine powered used instead).

Warning: Due to the many parts used in this rocket, expect a bunch of lag or choppiness at the very start. Must also remember the craft file is at 0.13 (though a similar craft could be built in 0.14 or later).
